title: Extend task schema with optional fields
description: Add optional fields to components/task-management/schema.json for ATEF integration: validation (pre_gate_passed, post_gate_passed, warnings), patterns (pattern_id, applied_at), checkpoints (array of checkpoint IDs), errors_encountered (array of error IDs). Fully backward compatible.
notes: Extended task schema with 4 optional ATEF fields: validation (pre_gate_passed, post_gate_passed, warnings, gate_results), patterns (pattern_id, applied_at, parameters), checkpoints (array of checkpoint IDs), errors_encountered (array of error IDs). All fields optional for full backward compatibility with existing task files.
